mean_en: a set of figures that show how many people watch or listen to a particular television or radio programme, used to show how popular a programme is
sentence: We received an excellent rating for our customer service.
sentence_trans: 我们的客户服务得到了超赞的评价。
word_etyma: rat=calculate计算 + ing名词后缀，构成抽象名词 → rating等级
